1.1.name: wordpress/change-links
1.1.description:
This is a highly customizable Ancher tag font plugin. You can set its font size, font color, Font Style for ancher tags in post, page and posttype contents.

I built this for my wedding band. We perform a lot in Toronto. It was pretty useful so I uploaded it here.

For more details, please visit: http://www.avincos.com
